alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:17AM CDT until April 05 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Western Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 517 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Omega to near Somerset, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Eagle Bend around 520 AM CDT. Valley Park around 530 AM CDT. Redwood around 535 AM CDT. Vicksburg, Le Tourneau and Yokena around 540 AM CDT. Oak Ridge around 545 AM CDT. Phoenix and Youngton around 550 AM CDT. Newman around 555 AM CDT. Utica around 600 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Learned, Delta and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
